bug.short_desc: Fedora - Missing flannel package for ppc64le architecture
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Missing flannel package for ppc64le architecture
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. dnf info flannel
Actual results: [root@localhost ~]# dnf info flannel Last metadata expiration check: 0:52:52 ago on Fri Nov 18 03:27:17 2016. Error: No matching Packages to list [root@localhost ~]#
Expected results: Should have a package in the repository.
Additional info:
It's a build dependency issue, the recent flannel builds need golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.7.git1e2e08e.fc24 in the buildroot, but it fails.
flannel-0.6.2-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-0b0a3acf2f

flannel-0.6.2-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-0b0a3acf2f

not able to install through dnf command, can someone help me to test this?
[root@localhost ~]# uname -a Linux localhost.localdomain 4.8.6-300.fc25.ppc64le #1 SMP Wed Nov 2 16:25:53 UTC 2016 ppc64le ppc64le ppc64le GNU/Linux [root@localhost ~]# dnf install flannel --enablerepo=updates-testing Last metadata expiration check: 0:10:55 ago on Sun Dec 25 22:06:56 2016. No package flannel available. Error: Unable to find a match. [root@localhost ~]#

You can run:
dnf install https://kojipkgs.fedoraproject.org//packages/flannel/0.6.2/1.fc26 /ppc64le/flannel-0.6.2-1.fc26.ppc64le.rpm
The flannel for ppc64le is built only in rawhide. Checking https://ppc.koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/, the latest flannel in rawhide is not ported here yet (though, already built on f25).

------- Comment From hannsj_uhl@de.ibm.com 2017-01-19 03:31 EDT------- Comment from Manjunath A. Kumatagi 2017-01-19 00:53:28 CST
I tried installing package manually and here are my findings:
[root@localhost ~]# rpm -qa | grep flannel flannel-0.6.2-1.fc26.ppc64le
[root@localhost ~]# flanneld -version 0.5.3+git
[root@localhost ~]# systemctl status flanneld -l ? flanneld.service - Flanneld overlay address etcd agent Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/flanneld.service; disabled; vendor pres Active: active (running) since Wed 2017-01-18 22:48:46 PST; 1min 26s ago Process: 23293 ExecStartPost=/usr/libexec/flannel/mk-docker-opts.sh -k DOCKER_NE Main PID: 23273 (flanneld) Tasks: 9 (limit: 4915) Memory: 14.8M CPU: 50ms CGroup: /system.slice/flanneld.service ??23273 /usr/bin/flanneld -etcd-endpoints=http://127.0.0.1:2379 -etcd-p
Jan 18 22:48:46 localhost.localdomain systemd[1]: Starting Flanneld overlay addres Jan 18 22:48:46 localhost.localdomain flanneld[23273]: I0118 22:48:46.858789 23273 Jan 18 22:48:46 localhost.localdomain flanneld[23273]: I0118 22:48:46.860140 23273 Jan 18 22:48:46 localhost.localdomain flanneld[23273]: I0118 22:48:46.861386 23273 Jan 18 22:48:46 localhost.localdomain flanneld[23273]: I0118 22:48:46.861420 23273 Jan 18 22:48:46 localhost.localdomain flanneld[23273]: I0118 22:48:46.867002 23273 Jan 18 22:48:46 localhost.localdomain flanneld[23273]: I0118 22:48:46.875103 23273 Jan 18 22:48:46 localhost.localdomain flanneld[23273]: I0118 22:48:46.875986 23273 Jan 18 22:48:46 localhost.localdomain flanneld[23273]: I0118 22:48:46.876008 23273 Jan 18 22:48:46 localhost.localdomain systemd[1]: Started Flanneld overlay address
[root@localhost ~]# ifconfig flannel.1 flannel.1: flags=4163<UP,BROADCAST,RUNNING,MULTICAST> mtu 1450 inet 10.20.66.0 netmask 255.255.0.0 broadcast 0.0.0.0 ether 5e:18:27:eb:7d:14 txqueuelen 0 (Ethernet) RX packets 0 bytes 0 (0.0 B) RX errors 0 dropped 0 overruns 0 frame 0 TX packets 0 bytes 0 (0.0 B) TX errors 0 dropped 0 overruns 0 carrier 0 collisions 0
Things are working fine, only concern I've is "flannel -version" command is not matching the version in the rpm name. -Thanks.
flannel-0.7.0-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-013e53830f

flannel-0.7.0-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. rpm version and command line version is still not matching.
[root@localhost ~]# flanneld --version 0.5.3+git [root@localhost ~]# [root@localhost ~]# [root@localhost ~]# rpm -qa | grep flannel flannel-0.7.0-1.fc26.ppc64le [root@localhost ~]#
flannel-0.7.0-2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-44e53aabed

Now the command version and rpm version are matching.
[root@localhost ~]# flanneld --version 0.7.0 [root@localhost ~]# rpm -qa | grep flannel flannel-0.7.0-2.fc26.ppc64le [root@localhost ~]#
